Html:
Just tested xda-tips for adding automatic screen rotation based on HTC Gsensor. Works great with GMap on HTC HD2:

Change registry as follow:

Under  HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\HTC\HTCSENSOR\GSensor\ModuleName
Add new string value GMap with value \Program files\gmap.net\GMap.NET.exe

Under  HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\HTC\HTCSENSOR\GSensor\WhiteList
Add new string value GMap with #NETCF_AGL_BASE_

Turn unit off and on. The maps are now automatically rotated when unit is turned 90 deg anticlockwise :-)
nice tip, works perfect! I'll add automatic function to do that in demo app
